summary: WHILE DRIVING THE VEHICLE  HESITATED TO ACCELERATE AND DIDN'T CHANGE GEARS.  THE VEHICLE ACCELERATED INTO FULL THROTTLE.  (TWO ACCIDENTS HAD OCCURRED DUE TO THESE FAILURES)  TS  THE FRONT END ALIGNMENT HAD PULLED TO THE LEFT, THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT AND THE TRANSMISSION HAD BECOME INOPERATIVE.  SCC
